youtube.title: How a Vascular Stent Works: Biology Explained Simply
youtube.description: Discover the incredible process of how vascular stents treat narrowed arteries caused by plaque, cholesterol, and calcium buildup. This clear medical animation makes complex biology easy to understand! Subscribe for more life-saving science insights.
